page.title: 16Education in Lezant Area
page.content: There is a{Pre_school Playgroup}which is held at Trebullett.It takes children from two years until they are ready to start school. Once children reach the age of four they attend{Trekenner CP School}part_ time,becoming fulltime when they are five.There are three classes in the school,which dates back to 1876.Most children walk or are transported by their parents,but there is a minibus service for those who live further than three miles away. At the age of eleven most children transfer to{Launceston College}which is the nearest comprehensive school, five miles to the north.Those who want to continue their education after sixteen can either stay,or attend the{ {Mid_Cornwall College for Further {Education}at St.Austell. {
